solution_line_template: The taco truck sold {family_soft_tacos} + {soft_tacos_per_other_customer} * {num_other_customers} = {family_soft_tacos} + {soft_tacos_from_other_customers} = <<{family_soft_tacos}+{soft_tacos_per_other_customer}*{num_other_customers}={total_soft_tacos}>>{total_soft_tacos} soft tacos.
It made {hard_shell_taco_price} * {family_hard_shell_tacos} = ${hard_shell_taco_price}*{family_hard_shell_tacos}={revenue_hard_shell_tacos}>>{revenue_hard_shell_tacos} from hard shell tacos.
Thus, the taco truck made {revenue_soft_tacos} + {revenue_hard_shell_tacos} = ${revenue_soft_tacos}+{revenue_hard_shell_tacos}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue} during the lunch rush.
